00003 #define OVERFILL_PENALTY 2000
00004 
00005 // i is width, j is height, l is lane, t is target
00006 
00007 cPlayTable::cPlayTable(int nwidth, int nheight) {
00008  
00009         width = nwidth; height = nheight;
00010 
00011         for (int i=0;i<width;i++) {
00012                 vector<cPlayNode*> tmpvec;
00013                 for (int j=0;j<height;j++) {
00014                         tmpvec.push_back(new cPlayNode(0));
00015                 }
00016                 positions.push_back(tmpvec);
00017                 statuses.push_back(PT_FINE);
00018         }
00019         
00020         texture1 = new cAnimatedTexture("data/tex1.png", 10, 50);
00021         texture2 = new cAnimatedTexture("data/tex2.png", 10, 50);
00022 
00023 }
00024 
00025 void cPlayTable::update() {
00026 
00027         for (int i=0;i<width;i++) {
00028                 for (int j=0;j<height;j++) {
00029                         if ((positions[i][j]->colour == WHITE) && (positions[i][j]->lit != 1)) {
00030                                 positions[i][j]->light(30000);
00031                         }
00032                         if (positions[i][j]->lit != 1) {
00033                                 int count = floodfill(positions, i, j, 0);
00034                                 
00035                                 if (count >= 3) { // we have a matching, so light nodes
00036                                         for (int i=0;i<width;i++) {
00037                                                 for (int j=0;j<height;j++) { 
00038                                                         if (positions[i][j]->marked == 1) {
00039                                                                 positions[i][j]->light(6000);
00040                                                         }
00041                                                 }
00042                                         }
00043                                         score += 10*count*count;
00044                                 }
00045                                 
00046                                 // reset the marks on the table.
00047                                 for (int i=0;i<width;i++) for (int j=0;j<height;j++) positions[i][j]->marked = 0;
00048                         
00049                         }
00050                 }
00051         }
00052         
00053 }
00054 
00055 int cPlayTable::addpickup(int lane, int colour) {
00056         int count = floodfill(positions, lane, height-1, DEFAULT_COLOUR, true);
00057                 
00058         // special cases for if the column is full.
00059         
00060         // if the lane is full but the new pickup forms a pair with the top place: we check to see if
00061         // the new pickup forms a group of three with the top place and any others.
00062         if ((positions[lane][height-1]->colour == colour) && (colour != WHITE)) { 
00063                 
00064                 if (count >= 2) { // we have a matching, so set off group
00065                         for (int i=0; i<width; i++) {
00066                                 for (int j=0;j<height;j++) { 
00067                                         if (positions[i][j]->marked == 1) {
00068                                                 positions[i][j]->light(0);
00069                                         }
00070                                 }
00071                         }
00072                         score += 10*count*count;
00073                 } else { // it counts as an overfill
00074                         dropcolumn(lane); score -= OVERFILL_PENALTY;
00075                         statuses[lane] = PT_OVERFILL;
00076                         return PT_OVERFILL;
00077                 }
00078                 return PT_FINE; 
00079         }
00080         
00081         // the lane is full and the new pickup doesn't form a group
00082         if (positions[lane][height-1]->colour != NONE) { 
00083 
00084                 dropcolumn(lane);
00085                 score -= OVERFILL_PENALTY;
00086                 statuses[lane] = PT_OVERFILL;
00087                 return PT_OVERFILL;
00088         }
00089 
00090         for (int i=0;i<width;i++) for (int j=0;j<height;j++) positions[i][j]->marked = 0;
00091 
00092         //otherwise, a normal block insert.
00093         positions[lane][getheight(lane)]->colour = colour;
00094         
00095         return PT_FINE;
00096         
00097 }
00098 
00099 void cPlayTable::deletepickup(int lane, int row) {
00100 
00101                 vector< vector<cPlayNode*> >::iterator it;
00102                 vector<cPlayNode*>::iterator jt;
00103                 
00104                 it = positions.begin();
00105                 it += lane;
00106                 
00107                 jt = (*it).begin();
00108                 jt += row;
00109         
00110                 jt = (*it).erase(jt); // clear the block
00111                 cPlayNode* tmpnode = new cPlayNode(0);
00112                 (*it).push_back(tmpnode); // and add a new one at the top
00113         
00114 }

00116 void cPlayTable::printtable() {
00117         
00118         for (int j=height-1;j>-1;j--) {
00119                 cout << " |";
00120                 for (int i=0;i<width;i++) {
00121                         cout << this->positions[i][j]->colour << "," << this->positions[i][j]->marked << " ";
00122                 } cout << "|" << endl;
00123         }       
00124 }

00126 void cPlayTable::draw() {
00127         
00128         glScalef(0.7,0.5,0.5);
00129         glTranslatef(-3, 0, 0);
00130         
00131         for (int i=0;i<width;i++) {
00132                 for (int j=0;j<height;j++) {
00133                         
00134                         glPushMatrix(); 
00135                         glTranslatef(0,0,-3*j); // move up the lane
00136                         
00137                         glScalef(1.3, 1.3, 1.3);
00138                         
00139                         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00140                         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00141                         glTexEnvi(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_MODULATE);
00142                         glColor3fv(color[positions[i][j]->colour][0]);
00143                         
00144                         if ((positions[i][j]->lit == 1) && (positions[i][j]->colour != WHITE)) {
00145                                 texture1->bind(); // animated
00146                         } else { 
00147                                 texture2->bind();
00148                         }
00149                         
00150                         glCallList(dlDrawQuad);
00151                         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00152                         glTexEnvi(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_MODULATE);
00153                 
00154                 
00155                 /*      //draw an outline
00156                         glColor3f(0.9,0.9,0.9);
00157                         glScalef(1.05,1.1,1.1);
00158                         glCallList(dlDrawQuad);*/
00159                         
00160                         glPopMatrix();
00161                 }
00162                 //move to the right to the next lane
00163                 glTranslatef(3,0,0);
00164         }       
00165 }
00166 
00167 int cPlayTable::getheight(int lane) {
00168         // check where it ends up (roll down till we feel a block below us)
00169         int j; // the row we end up in.
00170 
00171         for (j=height; j>-1; j--) {
00172                 //have we hit bottom? || have we hit a pickup below us?
00173                 if ((j==0) || (positions[lane][j-1]->colour != NONE)) {
00174                         return j;
00175                 } 
00176         }
00177         return -1; // should never happen; will segfault addpickup() (since blah[-1] doesn't exist)
00178 }
00179 
00180 void cPlayTable::dropcolumn(int lane) {
00181 
00182                 vector<cPlayNode*> tmpvector;
00183                 for (int j=0; j<height; j++) {  
00184                         cPlayNode* tmpnode = new cPlayNode(0);
00185                         tmpvector.push_back(tmpnode);   
00186                 }
00187                 vector< vector<cPlayNode*> >::iterator it = positions.begin();
00188                 it += lane;
00189                 it = positions.erase(it); // it now points to the element after those deleted 
00190                 positions.insert(it, tmpvector); //inserts where the old column was. (before the iterator position)
00191         
00192 }
00193 
00194 void _floodfill(vector< vector<cPlayNode*> >& grid, int i, int j, int t) { // l and i are the starting points for a 
00195                                                                 // particular recursion. t is the target colour.
00196         static int w = grid.size();
00197         static int h = grid[0].size();
00198         if ((grid[i][j]->colour == t) && (grid[i][j]->marked != 1))  { 
00199                 grid[i][j]->marked = 1; 
00200                 // now fill in around us
00201                 if (i+1 < w) if ((grid[i+1][j]->colour == t) && (grid[i+1][j]->marked != 1)) _floodfill(grid, i+1, j, t);
00202                 if (i-1 >-1) if ((grid[i-1][j]->colour == t) && (grid[i-1][j]->marked != 1)) _floodfill(grid, i-1, j, t);
00203                 if (j+1 < h) if ((grid[i][j+1]->colour == t) && (grid[i][j+1]->marked != 1)) _floodfill(grid, i, j+1, t);
00204                 if (j-1 >-1) if ((grid[i][j-1]->colour == t) && (grid[i][j-1]->marked != 1)) _floodfill(grid, i, j-1, t);       
00205         }
00206 }
00207 
00208 int cPlayTable::floodfill(vector< vector<cPlayNode*> >& grid, int i, int j, int targetcolour, bool considerlitnodes) {
00209 
00210         // if t is 0 then we assume that if there's a colour at (l,i), then we'll fill that.
00211         if (grid[i][j]->colour == NONE || grid[i][j]->colour == WHITE) return 0;
00212         if (!considerlitnodes) if (grid[i][j]->lit == 1) return 0;
00213     if (targetcolour == DEFAULT_COLOUR) targetcolour = grid[i][j]->colour;
00214 
00215         static int w = grid.size();
00216         static int h = grid[0].size();
00217         
00218         // first, fill the area
00219         _floodfill(grid, i, j, targetcolour);
00220         
00221         int count = 0;
00222         
00223         //now, count the marked positions.
00224         for (int i=0;i<w;i++) {
00225                 for (int j=0;j<h;j++) {
00226                         if (grid[i][j]->marked == 1) count++;
00227                 }
00228         }
00229         
00230         return count;
00231         
00232 }

00234 
00235 }
